title: Lập Trình Viên (Back-End, Front-End, Fullstack)
company_name: CHI NHÁNH GAION CO., LTD TẠI VIỆT NAM
job_description:
Participate in the design, development, and deployment of GAION's Big Data/AI solutions.
Implement system functions based on customer and project requirements.
Understand customers' business needs to deliver high-quality services that meet their expectations.
Execute tasks assigned by the Team Leader/Project Manager and collaborate with other teams to develop products.
Optimize existing features to enhance performance and user experience.
requirements:
1. Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in IT-related fields from a university recognized by the Korea Immigration Office.
Ph.D./ Master’s degree or 8+ years of working experience (for university graduates).
Intermediate English communication skills.
(Optional) Korean language proficiency is a plus.
2. Technical Skills
5+ years of experience in Python programming (or equivalent experience in other programming languages).
Experience with JavaScript, HTML5, CSS.
Strong knowledge of relational databases (PostgreSQL, Oracle, MySQL, MSSQL, etc.).
Experience working with Git.
3. Preferred Qualifications
2+ years of team leadership experience.
Experience with Django framework.
Experience with ReactJS.
Familiarity with Bootstrap CSS framework.
Experience working with at least one major cloud provider: AWS, Azure, or GCP.
Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.
Understanding of information security.
Experience with Big Data platforms/solutions (Splunk, ELK, Opensearch, etc.).
Korean language proficiency is a strong advantage.
career_tags: Thành Thạo Ít Nhất Một Ngôn Ngữ Lập Trình (back End: Java, Python, Node.js, Php; Front End: Javascript, Typescript)
